name: SO FUN3
description: Authentic Hunan-style handmade rice noodles — enjoy them dry or in a hearty soup, packed with bold, spicy flavors.
reason: if you are craving some chinese cuisine, specifically noodles or rice! 🍜🍚

name: The Green Bar
description: Our very own collection of fresh mouthwatering honest-to-goodness, well crafted gourmet superfood salad recipes for all to enjoy
reason: if you are craving something healthy and light, like a salad or a wrap! 🥗🌯

name: McDonalds ARC
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
reason: if you decide today should be your cheat day! 🍔🍟

name: Sakana-No-Suppu
description: Be ready to enjoy the simple full-bodied soup accompanied by the rich texture of our fish and seafood we are going to serve.
reason: if today is a rainy day and you feel like having something soupy! 🥣🌧️

name: Hundred Grains
description: Seize control of your dining experience. Hundred Grains grants you the autonomy to make your own choices, offering a selection of 40 to 60 unforgettable dishes that represent diverse flavors from Sichuan, Hunan, and Guangdong.
reason: if variety and chinese cuisine is what you are looking for! 🍚🥢

name: Stuff D
description: Our Kebabs, Burritos, Quesadillas and Signature Daily Bowls are made daily from scratch, because we believe food tastes better when it's made fresh.
reason: if you are looking for something easy to eat and filling, like a burrito or a kebab! 🌯🥗

name: SBCD Korean Tofu House
description: SBCD Korean Tofu House specializes in a variety of Korean soft tofu soup, where the “soon” in “soontofu” means soft. It upholds the kitchen philosophy of serving uplifting and complete meals, and every soontofu dish is created with soft and silken tofu that is hand-made fresh daily, and prepared in 4 different levels of spiciness for the broth – mild, medium, spicy and crazy hot
reason: if you've recently watch some kdrama and wants to eat like your korean oppa! 🥘🇰🇷

name: Ichiban Boshi
description: We source the best ingredients direct from Japan and globally, and through our craftsmanship with Japanese expertise, we guarantee that every dish - from sushi to our popular set meals - is crafted to warm your hearts with perfected flavours.
reason: if you are craving some comforting Japanese eats and a little foodie therapy 🍣🍜

name: MK Levure Naturelle
description: A well-known bakery and pastry branding established 15 years with 15 outlets located in Singapore, is also well versed with the knowledge of food quality.
reason: if you are craving some light snacks, be it sweet/savoury, this is it! 🍪

name: Cedele
description: Cedele today is an artisanal food and beverage chain offering a wide selection of soups, salads, breads, cakes, sandwiches, greens, grains, grills and a whole lot more.
location: 20 Pasir Panjang Rd, #02-12 Mapletree Business City II
reason: Feeling virtuous? Grab a fab salad—then balance it out with a sweet little bake. 😇🍪

name: Old Chang Kee
description: For over half a century, Singaporeans from all walks of life have enjoyed Old Chang Kee's signature Curry’O - a crispy pastry shell generously stuffed with curried potato, chicken and an egg slice, all cooked with special herbs and spices.Old Chang Kee also offers other delectable hot snacks and lip-smacking quick bites.
reason: Craving crunch? Dive into some golden, crispy fried finger food—then balance it out with a fresh, zesty dip. Because life’s all about delicious contrasts! 😇🍟✨

name: Super Thai by Soi Aroy
description: Super Thai is brought to you by the same group that crafted Soi Aroy, the #1 Ranked Thai Restaurant in Singapore on TripAdvisor. Experience our extended menu with new signatures in a comfortable modern environment that exudes a little charm of Thailand.
reason: When you're in the mood for bold, bright flavors—think spicy, sour, and everything in between—Thai food delivers.🌶️🍋🥵

name: Subway
description: Casual counter-serve chain for build-your-own sandwiches & salads, with health-conscious options.
location: 40 Pasir Panjang Rd, #02-34 Mapletree Business City II, Singapore 117383
reason: Craving something personalized and well-balanced? Subway lets you build the sandwich that fits your taste and lifestyle. 🥪🥗✨

name: Chuan Taizi Mala Tang
description: Our unique taste and variety of hotpot flavors, including original Malatang, Sichuan-style Malatang, Mala hotpot, stir-fry with garlic, tom yum soup, and tomato soup, are the perfect fusion of tradition and innovation.
reason: Craving that spicy tingle? Dive into a bowl of bold, brothy Mala Tang magic! 🌶️🥢
